//ì˜ˆì‹œ
function meetAt(year, month, date) {
  let length = arguments.length;

  if (length === 1) {
    return year + "ë…„";
  } else if (length === 2) {
    return year + "ë…„ " + month + "ì›”";
  } else if (length === 3) {
    return year + "/" + month + "/" + date;
  }
}
